text: Kɛlɛ Levi mavofodai la zou nɔpɛ sɔlɔɔga ga nɔnɔ wo zaama, mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-zalaɠa ɠula vai ɠa é ga tɔnɔi. Nii é ga Gade ná-bolodai, ta Luɓɛn ná-bolodai, ta Manasé ná-bolodai ɠilazuʋɛ, naati ti tɔnɔi zɔlɔɔgɛ na, Zuludɛn ʋoluʋelei, folo ɠulazu ʋelei, nii Moize, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-botiɠɛ nui feeni ti ya.»
